About

Science Pulse is a social listening tool designed to bridge the gap between journalism and science in social media. This project is led by ICFJ Knight Fellow SÃ©rgio Spagnuolo, in collaboration with Volt Data Lab, a data-driven news agency he founded in Sao Paulo, Brazil. It is supported by the International Center for Journalists (ICFJ) and by the Brazilian science journalism agency Bori.
